item.title: Scraped Books
item.description: Scraped Books I have developed this project using Python and the BeautifulSoup library. I have also used the requests library to get the HTML code of the website. Description This is a project from the Python course on OpenClassrooms. The goal is to scrape the website Books to Scrape and to save the data in a CSV file. The code is available on GitHub
